comments.body:
@mkrizek  The `non_local` entry should not be added to existing tests, since it disables coverage support for those tests. If it is needed for the test to work, a new test needs to be created.

When you're ready to work on a revised version of this, I'd like to discuss the tests to see if we can avoid the use of `non_local`.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +3,7 @@needs/root  # only on macOS and FreeBSD to configure network interfaces
skip/aix
non_local # workaround to allow override of ansible_python_interpreter; disables coverage on this integration target
